description: Detects the creation of a named pipe with a pattern found in CobaltStrike malleable C2 profiles Author: Florian Roth, Christian Burkard. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Chrome instances using the exactly same name pipe named mojo.something
name: CobaltStrike Named Pipe Patterns
query: (((file.name:(\\mojo.5688.8052.183894939787088877* OR \\mojo.5688.8052.35780273329370473* OR \\mypipe\-f* OR \\mypipe\-h* OR \\ntsvcs* OR \\scerpc* OR \\win_svc* OR \\spoolss* OR \\msrpc_* OR \\win\\msrpc_* OR \\wkssvc* OR \\f53f* OR \\windows.update.manager* OR \\SearchTextHarvester* OR \\DserNamePipe* OR \\PGMessagePipe* OR \\MsFteWds* OR \\f4c3* OR \\fullduplex_* OR \\rpc_*) OR file.name:("\\demoagent_11" OR "\\demoagent_22")) OR (file.name:\\Winsock2\\CatalogChangeListener\-* AND file.name:*\-0,)) AND (NOT (file.name:("\\wkssvc" OR "\\spoolss" OR "\\scerpc" OR "\\ntsvcs" OR "\\SearchTextHarvester" OR "\\PGMessagePipe" OR "\\MsFteWds"))))
